description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前最高领导人江泽民的次子。曾任上海市建设和管理委员会巡视员、上海城市发展信息研究中心主任、上海市城乡建设和交通委员会巡视员。
description.en: The second son of former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, Jiang Zemin. He has served as an inspector of the Shanghai Municipal Construction and Management Commission, director of the Shanghai Urban Development Information Research Center, and an inspector of the Shanghai Municipal Urban-Rural Construction and Transportation Commission.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国最高领导人、中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China and General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 江绵康的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Jiang Miankang.

description.zh-cn: 外逃美国的中国官员，曾任温州市主管城建的副市长。她声称因拒绝江绵康索要土地的要求而遭到政治迫害。
description.en: A Chinese official who fled to the United States and formerly served as the vice mayor of Wenzhou in charge of urban construction. She claimed she was politically persecuted for refusing Jiang Miankang's request for land.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所高等院校。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的科研机构。
description.en: A scientific research institution located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning located in Shanghai, China.

description.en: A research center located in Shanghai, China.

en: Shanghai Municipal Urban-Rural Construction and Transportation Commission

description.en: A constituent department of the Shanghai Municipal Government.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所著名中学。
description.en: A renowned high school located in Shanghai, China.

nodes.id: 威斯康辛大学麦迪逊分校

zh-cn: 威斯康辛大学麦迪逊分校

description.zh-cn: 位于美国威斯康星州麦迪逊市的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Madison, Wisconsin, United States.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 江绵康是江泽民的次子。
description.en: Jiang Miankang is the second son of Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 江绵康是王冶坪的次子。
description.en: Jiang Miankang is the second son of Wang Yeping.

description.zh-cn: 江志云是江绵康的女儿。
description.en: Jiang Zhiyun is the daughter of Jiang Miankang.

description.zh-cn: 江绵康是江苏省扬州市人。
description.en: Jiang Miankang is from Yangzhou, Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 江绵康于1985年毕业于上海第二工业大学。
description.en: Jiang Miankang graduated from Shanghai Second Polytechnic University in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 江绵康于1999年至2006年在华东师范大学获得博士学位。
description.en: Jiang Miankang obtained a PhD from East China Normal University between 1999 and 2006.

description.zh-cn: 江绵康于1985年毕业后在上海电器科学研究所工作。
description.en: After graduating in 1985, Jiang Miankang worked at the Shanghai Electrical Apparatus Research Institute.

relationships.target: 上海市建设和管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 江绵康曾任上海市建设和管理委员会巡视员。
description.en: Jiang Miankang served as an Inspector of the Shanghai Municipal Construction and Management Commission.

relationships.target: 上海城市发展信息研究中心

description.zh-cn: 江绵康曾任上海城市发展信息研究中心主任。
description.en: Jiang Miankang served as the Director of the Shanghai Urban Development Information Research Center.

relationships.target: 上海市城乡建设和交通委员会

description.zh-cn: 江绵康曾任上海市城乡建设和交通委员会巡视员。
description.en: Jiang Miankang served as an Inspector of the Shanghai Municipal Urban-Rural Construction and Transportation Commission.

description.zh-cn: 江志云高中就读于上海市南洋模范中学。
description.en: Jiang Zhiyun attended Shanghai Nanyang Model High School for her high school education.

relationships.target: 威斯康辛大学麦迪逊分校

description.zh-cn: 江志云在美国威斯康辛大学麦迪逊分校修读本科学位。
description.en: Jiang Zhiyun pursued her bachelor's degree at the University of Wisconsin–Madison in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 杨秀珠声称，在她担任温州市主管城建的副市长时，因屡次回绝江绵康索要500亩土地的不合规要求而得罪了他。
description.en: Yang Xiuzhu claimed that when she was the vice mayor of Wenzhou in charge of urban construction, she offended Jiang Miankang by repeatedly rejecting his non-compliant requests for 500 mu of land.

description.zh-cn: 杨秀珠声称，她开始被调查主要是因为她得罪了江泽民。
description.en: Yang Xiuzhu claimed that the investigation against her began mainly because she had offended Jiang Zemin.
